label: ID
description: This field stores a credit union-defined ID to identify the Portfolio record.

label: DESCRIPTION
description: This field stores the credit union-defined field and typically contains a member's name or other identifying information.

label: BALANCE
description: This field contains the total value of all stocks described in the Portfolio Tracking records under this Portfolio record.

label: AVAILABLEBALANCE
description: This field contains the total value of the member's stocks available for pledging.

label: CLOSEDATE
description: This field stores the date the Portfolio record was closed.

label: FMLASTDATE
description: This field stores the last date file maintenance was performed on the Portfolio record.

label: RECORDCHANGEDATE
description: The system stores the system date in this field when you create, change, or save the Portfolio record. Sometimes the system updates this field because the record was saved, even though there may not be any actual changes in the record.

label: NOTEPURGEDATE
description: This field stores the date when you purged the Note records under the Portfolio record.
